info.text: Menorah familiar that gives multishot and tears down proportionate to the number of lit candles
Getting hit with 7 lit candles bursts 8 blue flames and makes Isaac unable to shoot for a little while
Isaac is immune from his own bombs
Bombs destroy enemy projectiles and knock back enemies
To place bombs normally hold drop button
Spawns a familiar that moves by jumping from tile to tile, dealing 20 damage to nearby enemies and 40 damage to enemies directly landed on
Spawns a familiar that moves by jumping from tile to tile, dealing 40 damage to nearby enemies and 80 damage to enemies directly landed on
Bombs reroll pedestal items within its explosion radius
Has a 25% chance to destroy items instead of rerolling them
Activates D1 effect for pickups in explosion's radius
Activates D4 effect if Isaac in explosion's radius
Activates D8 effect if Isaac in explosion's radius
Activates D20 effect for pickups in explosion's radius
Activates D100 effect for Isaac and pickups in explosion's radius
Activates Spindown Dice effect for collectibles in explosion's radius
When taking damage, Isaac does a spin attack that deals 8x damage, inflicts bleed, and blocks projectiles
Bombs create rock waves in all 4 cardinal directions
The rock waves can damage enemies, destroy objects, and reveal secret rooms
Tears turn 90 degrees to target enemies that they may have missed
Throwable familiar that converts soul and black hearts to active item charges, stores up to 6 charges
Pressing drop button supplies active item with stored charges
When enemies spawn they have a 25% chance to contain 1-3 pennies which can extracted by damaging them
For Keeper and Tainted Keeper chance is 16.7% and only 1-2 pennies
Whenever any pickup count ends in a 7, Isaac has a chance to shoot golden tears that turn enemies into special slot machines
The chance is increased the more pickup counts end in 7
Combat rooms are cleared after 30 seconds of not damaging any enemies
Spawns chests at the start of each floor for each special room left unexplored on the previous floor
Placed bombs will not explode until the player leaves its explosion radius
Spawns chests at the start of each floor for each special room left unexplored on the previous floor
Disconnects Isaac's head from his body allowing it to move like Mr. Maw head
The head deals 10.5x Isaac's damage per second
Every 4th tear is shot with low fire delay
Less effective for each concecutive use in the same room
Each tear shot by Isaac increases item charge by one
Spawns an illusion clone when used
Illusion clones are the same character as you and die in one hit
Gives a random pill when picked up
Increase pill drop rate when held
Consumes currently held pill and applies an effect to the entire room depending on the type of pill
Throwable voodoo pin that swaps Isaac's hitbox with enemy hitboxes
Hitting bosses makes it last for 5 seconds
Fires a rapid inacurate strike of seeds at a set interval
30% chance to shoot a wax tear that burns and slows enemies
Gives an aura that slowly grows when shooting. Shrinks when not shooting
+25% chance for heart pickups to be double hearts
+80% chance for the room clear reward to be a heart after taking damage
8% chance to a shoot slowing tear that leaves black creep on impact
11% chance to a shoot slowing tear that leaves black creep on impact
11% chance to a shoot slowing tear that leaves black creep on impact
14% chance to a shoot slowing tear that leaves black creep on impact
